definition: tree trunk/stump (tree root)/a plant/classifier for trees or plants/strain (biology)/to involve others (in shady business)

sentences.english: Rather, they strongly preferred the infected ones.
sentences.chinese: 相反，它們對感染植株青睞有加。

sentences.english: Vigorous plants have thick & large leaves, strong disease resistance.
sentences.chinese: 植株生長勢強，葉片寬大肥厚，抗病性強，座果率高。

sentences.english: A field may be smothered with aphids .
sentences.chinese: 一塊田的植株可以被蚜蟲蓋滿。

sentences.english: The regenerated plantlets were obtained from the cotyledons after shoot and root inducing cultivations.
sentences.chinese: 子葉經發芽及生根誘導培養後得到了再生植株。

sentences.english: Plants many branched, forming a compact cushion of leafy shoots.
sentences.chinese: 植株多分枝，形成一個葉狀枝的小型墊。

sentences.english: The inducibility of Shah You-6 was higher than that of Tai Zhong Yu-39.
sentences.chinese: 汕優6號再生植株的誘導能力大於臺中育39。

sentences.english: And the distribution of nutrients in different organs varied in cultivars and harvest periods.
sentences.chinese: 營養成分在植株器官中的分配因品種與收穫期而異。

sentences.english: Study on Somatic Embryogenesis and Plant Regeneration of Theobroma Cacao L.
sentences.chinese: 可可體細胞胚胎發生及植株再生體系的構建。

sentences.english: The resistant plants obtained from experiment were slow-moving both in differentiation and the next growth.
sentences.chinese: 在獲得的抗性植株中，分化及後期的生長非常緩慢。

sentences.english: There are also clues to indicate that plastids of pollen plant leaves may be heterogeneous.
sentences.chinese: 花粉植株細胞中的質體可能是不均一的。

sentences.english: We shall advise them to keep uprooting and burning the infected crop, " Asea said.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該建議他們堅持做到把受感染的植株拔起燒掉。

sentences.english: All plants with overhead melon phenomenon were runt seedlings.
Those plants that determined as haploids were doubled by 2%colchicine.
sentences.chinese: 經鑑定爲單倍體的植株，用2%秋水仙素進行加倍。

sentences.english: An insect resistant maize plant produced by the method of claim 14.
sentences.chinese: 用權利要求14的方法產生的抗蟲玉米植株。

sentences.english: There seemed to exist a starting process for the rice plants to respond to cold water treatment.
sentences.chinese: 冷灌處理開始至植株產生反應之間存在一個啓動過程。

sentences.english: Also showing in numbers now are the fennel shoots and onion sets.
sentences.chinese: 茴香的新芽和洋蔥的植株現在也顯得多了起來。

definition: tiller (stem at the base of grass plants)
terminal bud (growing at the tip of a plant)
axillary bud/bud growing from axil of plant
ear (of corn or sorghum etc)/bunch (of grapes)/infructescence
